effect: Boosts the Pokémon's highest stat (except HP) by 30% when Electric Terrain is active or if holding Booster Energy.
synergies: Electric Terrain setters (e.g., Pincurchin, Tapu Koko)
Pokémon with high Attack, Special Attack, or Speed stats
notes: Introduced in Generation IX; the stat boost is determined at the start of battle or when the ability activates, and does not change dynamically if stats are altered mid-battle.
